item.title: Relocation and Resurrection
item.description:
After a vastly long hiatus (the post 5 years back stating I intended to blog more really doesn’t count), I’ve finally put something together.

Basically I have a batch of things I am trying out and so want to keep more permanent notes on, hence bringing this back into play.

Hosting

Previously I put content onto wordpress.com – I certainly did not want to get involved in actually managing the blogging platform. However in the mean time I have been using Hugo for various thing, and it is a much nicer system for me to work with, so moving to Hugo was an easy choice.

Additionally I can now use Github Pages to host the content (or various similar services).

The old Wordpress content was dumped as an XML export and converted to Markdown as described in Conversion tools from Wordpress to Hugo

The theme is hugo-flex

Now all I need to do is write more content.
